description: Chika is sending photographs from the summer holidays, and a letter: Now she will visit her cousin Taeko, searching for help with her summer homework. Aoi allows her to stay, and everyone offers to help her. Thankful Chika volunteers to help Taeko with her household work, and unlike her cousin she doesn`t cause any mishaps. Also, Tina has found a new video game opponent who reveals surprising skills. Soon Chika has all her homeworks completed, with one exception.
